frameDefinitions: A Speaker communicates a message stating an Item's membership in a Category, i.e., asserts that the Item has the defining characteristics of the Category.
A Cognizer construes an Item as belonging to a certain Category.
In this frame a Theme is moved by a Vehicle which is not directly under their power.
A Questioner asks a Witness (or defendant) questions in the context of a court procedure.
An intentional Agent or a causing event (Cause) event causes a Theme which is already in motion to take a different Path or Direction, or reach a different Goal than the Original_path.
An Agent who is engaged in an Undertaking accords a Degree of importance to a Consideration that influences the success of an Undertaking.
frameExamples: He <t>depicted</t> his involvement as merely peripheral.
You 've already <t>stereotyped</t> me as a bimbo, have n't you?
We 'd like to <t>cross-examine</t> the witness if we can.

The hotel business didn't last - especially after the construction of a railroad
<t>diverted</t> travelers a few miles west to what is now the village of Eagle
Our company <t>emphasizes</t> marketing tried and true products and services.INI
listRoleDefinitions: The individual that communicates the message concerning the <fen>Category</fen> of an <fen>Item</fen>.
The class of entities with characteristics that match those of the <fen>Item</fen> according to the portrayal of the <fen>Speaker</fen>.
The entity that the <fen>Speaker</fen> portrays as belonging to a <fen>Category</fen>.
The piece of text in which a <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates their categorization of the <fen>Item</fen>.
The point in time at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes a characterization of the <fen>Item</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> characterizes the <fen>Item</fen>
This is the person who performs an act of categorization. Typically, this frame element is expressed as an External Argument.
This is the entity which is construed or treated by the <fen>Cognizer</fen> as being an instance of a particular <fen>Category</fen>. Typically, the <fen>Item</fen> is expressed as an Object.

This frame element expresses a general type or class of which the <fen>Item</fen> is considered an instance. Typically, it is expressed in a prepositional phrase headed by <ment>as</ment> or <ment>under</ment>.

This frame element expresses properties of the <fen>Item</fen> which is used as a basis for categorization. <fen>Criteria</fen> are the general dimensions along which <fen>Item</fen>s can potentially differ from one another and hence, fall into different <fen>Category</fen>s. For example, a paint sample can be classified <ment>by color</ment> or <ment>by finish (matte or gloss)</ment>; if they are classified by color, one can be classified <ment>as orange</ment> and another <ment>as red</ment>. The <fen>Criteria</fen> role is typically expressed as a PP headed by <ment>by</ment>, or as a complex PP of the form <ment>on the basis of...</ment>:
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate when a certain Categorization was made.
The <fen>Theme</fen> is the entity which moves by means of the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The <fen>Vehicle</fen> is the means of conveyance of the <fen>Theme</fen>. It is usually expressed in a <ment>PP</ment>-complement or the direct object.
Any expression which implies a definite starting-point of motion expresses the frame element <fen>Source</fen>.
The <fen>Path</fen> describes the trajectory of the motion.
The <fen>Goal</fen> is the endpoint of the trajectory of motion.
The Area is the location where the motion takes place.
When the riding takes place.
The individual who asks a <fen>Witness</fen> questions.
A person who is present in a courtroom in order to give some form of evidence, has been sworn in, and is being examined by a <fen>Questioner</fen>.
When the examination occurs.
Where the examination takes place.
The entity that is in motion, and changes path due to the action of an Agent or due to a Cause.

The route that the <fen>Theme</fen> was originally headed for.  In cases when the <fen>Theme</fen> is an intentional actor or is controlled by an intentional actor, the <fen>Original_path</fen> correlates with the (former) plan of the actor.  In other cases, the <fen>Original_path</fen> corresponds to what would be expected for the path of the <fen>Theme</fen> from general principles or physics.  (In some cases, the <fen>Original_path</fen> may indicate the intended destination, and not just the path, of the <fen>Theme</fen>.)
The <fen>Path</fen> refers to (a part of) the ground over which the <fen>Theme</fen> ends up travelling after being diverted.
The location the <fen>Theme</fen> ends up in after being redirected.

This role is used for expressions that indicate motion along a line from the current deitic center towards a reference point (which may be implicit) that does not necessarily correspond to the <fen>Goal</fen>.  Often <fen>Direction</fen> is defined with reference to the canonical orientation of the <fen>Theme</fen>, the orientation imposed by an implicit observer, or the inherent orientation of the scene.
An individual that determines the change in course of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
An event that brings about the change in the <fen>Path</fen> of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the redirection of motion occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is the location at which the redirection occurs.
An event or state of affairs, an attribute, or an entity whose properties have the potential to influence the success of the <fen>Agent</fen>'s <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the individual who devotes time, concentration, or other resources to a <fen>Consideration</fen> that is important for the success of a larger <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Competing_consideration</fen> is another factor that is relevant to the <fen>Undertaking</fen> to which the <fen>Agent</fen> devotes less attention or effort.
The <fen>Artifact</fen> is a physical object designed with some <fen>Consideration</fen> in mind, such that it functions to facilitate the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Action</fen> is performed with importance placed on the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
The time period during which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches a specified degree of importance to the <fen>Consideration</fen> to further the success of the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location in which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches the specified level of importance  to the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
listRoleExamples: However, <fex>'A Brief History of Medicine'</fex> characterizes influenza as the most deadly plague, overall.
<fex>Kim</fex> categorized the books under fiction. <fex>Kim</fex> categorized them on the basis of genre.
Kim categorized <fex>the books</fex> under fiction.
Kim categorized the book <fex>as/under fiction</fex>.
The students were categorized <fex>on the basis of their test scores</fex>.
<fex>20 years ago</fex> people would consider this as nothing unusual
<fex>Margeret</fex> flew to Cabo San Lucas.
Professor Frink sailed to Italy <fex>on an oceanliner</fex>.
We flew <fex>from Atlanta</fex>.
The caravan rode <fex>through the desert</fex>.
We sailed <fex>to Morocco</fex>.
We rode <fex>around the state</fex>.
We will fly back to New York <fex>in September</fex>.
You have leave to examine <fex>the witness.</fex>
VTA detoured motorists <fex>from southbound I-880</fex> onto Airport Boulevard to access Coleman Avenue.
Traffic was redirected Tuesday <fex>along Melrose Avenue</fex> to make way for the scoreboard columns, Mellecker said.
Not knowing any better, he redirected people <fex>to the city center</fex>.
Flight 93 left Newark, NJ, earlier that day, bound for San Francisco, but it was hijacked by four terrorists who diverted it <fex>back toward Washington, DC</fex> .
When we ended up over in Marrakech, or Dakar, <fex>they</fex> diverted us up to Tobruk.

We even got a bonus morning in Tokyo's international airport when <fex>a bad storm</fex>
diverted us on the way to Asia.
<fex>Last Tuesday</fex> they were detouring everybody down onto 5th avenue .
They redirected us <fex name=''>at the corner of Alstone and Bokchoy Avenue</fex>.
The ICBL has prioritised <fex>working to achieve universalisation of the Mine Ban Treaty in South Asia by 2004</fex>.
Dell said Friday <fex>the company</fex> will put more emphasis on selling software
Monophysite Christians  emphasized Christ's divinity <fex>over his humanity</fex>.
Water is a scarce commodity on French Island so <fex>the guest house</fex> places strong emphasis on water conservation.
Result Oriented <fex>Management</fex>
<fex>In the 1960s</fex> Foucault placed great weight on the notion of archeology.
<fex>In Arizona</fex> we emphasize western bats with a special focus on species identification.
